tool_description: Generate emails or connection requests based on your prospect’s Linkedin profile. This tool is especially powerful for sales and marketing teams.
name: Messages Generation Tool
title: Messages Generation Tool

api_list.name: generateLinkedinMessages
api_list.description: Generate 5 different hyper personalized Linkedin connection messages instantly. You also have access to key data about your prospect easily.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://messages-generation-tool.p.rapidapi.com/connection_messages/www.linkedin.com/in/mohamedelerian/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "messages-generation-tool.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
